name: Bushwalking around Sydney
description: Discover the natural side of Sydney... by Bushwalking! Safely join me on one or more of the many bushwalks available around the Northern Beaches and the Ku-Ring-Gai National Park. With so many amazing walks to choose from within an hours drive from the capital, I can help tailor make your walk to suit you, and I'll even do the most scenic drive I can think of to get there and back so you get to see as much as possible :)
